cause.description:
My name is William Sheldrick - and as you can see by my pictures i was born with a defect in my face and body. I have Just one hand and even thats small and shrivelled (much like Jeremy Beadle who used to be on game for a laugh) Im sure that the majority of people out in Facebook land and beyond could afford perhaps £1-2 so that a disfigured child (at heart) could once again smile out of his wrongly placed mouth. Remember £1 buys you a sleepful night knowing that you have helped a flid-kid. I thank you.
1. Disfigurement is NOT nice
2. Having no laptop is NOT nice
3. Being Disfigure and Having no Laptop is even more not nice
cause.mission: Give me money to buy a latop
cause.name: Buy me a latop
